content: The Yellow Wind Sage is a required Yaoguai King and the final boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. Located at the center of the large black tornado in the Yellow Wind Formation in the center of the region, you'll need two Key Items to open a path to him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Wind_Sage.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Wind Sage'.
The content is as follows:
The Yellow Wind Sage is a required Yaoguai King and the final boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. Located at the center of the large black tornado in the Yellow Wind Formation in the center of the region, you'll need two Key Items to open a path to him.
